idToTestNameHash.MoTe1: Modify Tests readFileSequentially returns a promise
idToTestNameHash.MoTe2: Modify Tests readFileSequentially resolves to the complete story with all 4 parts joined by newlines
idToTestNameHash.FrScTe1: From Scratch Tests resolvedWrapper returns a promise that resolves to the value passed in
idToTestNameHash.FrScTe2: From Scratch Tests resolvedWrapper works with different types of values
idToTestNameHash.FrScTe3: From Scratch Tests rejectedWrapper returns a rejected promise
idToTestNameHash.FrScTe4: From Scratch Tests rejectedWrapper rejects with an Error object containing the message
idToTestNameHash.FrScTe5: From Scratch Tests handleResolvedPromise logs the resolved value and returns a promise with the uppercase value
idToTestNameHash.FrScTe6: From Scratch Tests handleResolvedPromise uses .then() to handle the promise (not await)
idToTestNameHash.FrScTe7: From Scratch Tests handleResolvedOrRejectedPromise handles resolved promises the same as handleResolvedPromise
idToTestNameHash.FrScTe8: From Scratch Tests handleResolvedOrRejectedPromise catches rejected promises, logs error message, and returns null
idToTestNameHash.FrScTe9: From Scratch Tests pauseForMs returns a promise that resolves to undefined
idToTestNameHash.MoTe3: Modify Tests readFileSequentially reads files in sequential order (part1, then part2, then part3, then part4)
idToTestNameHash.MoTe4: Modify Tests readFileSequentially handles errors with .catch() and logs them
idToTestNameHash.MoTe5: Modify Tests readFilesParallel returns a promise
idToTestNameHash.MoTe6: Modify Tests readFilesParallel resolves to the complete story with all 4 parts joined by newlines
idToTestNameHash.MoTe7: Modify Tests readFilesParallel uses Promise.all to read files in parallel
idToTestNameHash.MoTe8: Modify Tests readFilesParallel handles errors with .catch() and logs them
idToTestNameHash.FrScTe10: From Scratch Tests pauseForMs calls setTimeout with the passed in milliseconds
idToTestNameHash.FrScTe11: From Scratch Tests pauseForMs resolves after the specified time has passed
